eBay | Sr. Android Engineer | Portland or San Jose | ONSITE or REMOTE (US only) | fulltime

We're an agile team with about 8 devs (iOS and Android). We've got an independent scrum master (yes!). If you join in Portland we've got also beer on tap.

You should have at least +3 years experience on Android development. If you want to be part of one of the best rated ecommerce apps just apply here:
